price: Fuulli Gooftaa keetii nihafa, kan saahiba guddinaafi ulfinaa tahe.
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
